op.title: ATTENTION PINKOS
op.body:
'ART' IS NOTHING MORE THAN A NEW YORK HOLLYWOOD COMMUNIST PLOY TO TURN MEN INTO EFFIMINATE CHINA LOVERS AND WOMEN INTO BUTCH LESBIANS

YOUR DAYS ARE NUMBERED

KILL ALL ARTISTS

replies.body: raiding our board again? what else is /NEW ?

Do not harass other communities. You have been banned from posting on /ART. Consider this your last warning. Next time it's a global ban.
Also, snipping this thread.
